effect_entries.effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Water moves by 20%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
A hold item that
raises the power of
WATER-type moves.

A hold item that
raises the power of
WATER-type moves.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
A teardrop-shaped gem that boosts
the power of WATER-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups
the power of Water-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups
the power of Water-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups
the power of Water-type moves.

Objet à tenir. Gemme en forme de
goutte d’eau montant la puissance
des capacités de type Eau.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups
the power of Water-type moves.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a teardrop-shaped gem that ups
the power of Water-type moves.

しずくの　かたちの　ほうせき。
もたせると　みずタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

물방울 모양의 보석.
지니게 하면 물타입
기술의 위력이 올라간다.

Objet à tenir. Une gemme en forme de goutte
d’eau qui augmente la puissance des capacités
de type Eau.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Ein tränenförmiger
Edelstein, der Attacken vom Typ Wasser verstärkt.

Debe llevarlo un Pokémon. Aumenta el carisma
en los concursos.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Gemma a forma di goccia che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Acqua.

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This teardrop-shaped gem boosts
the power of Water-type moves.

しずくの　形の　宝石。
持たせると　みずタイプの
技の　威力が　あがる。

しずくの　かたちの　ほうせき。
もたせると　みずタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　あがる。

물방울 모양의 보석.

水滴形狀的寶石。
攜帶後，水屬性的
招式威力就會提高。

d’eau qui augmente la puissance des capacités
de type Eau.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Ein tränenförmiger Edelstein,
der Attacken vom Typ Wasser verstärkt.

Gema con forma de gota de agua que fortalece
los movimientos de tipo Agua. Debe llevarla un
Pokémon.

Gemma a forma di goccia che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Acqua.
